thread.title: Body Cameras on Principals Prevent False Accusations
thread.title_full: Body Cameras on Principals Prevent False Accusations

title: Body Cameras on Principals Prevent False Accusations
text:
22 Body Cameras on Principals Prevent False Accusations 
Center for Digital Education: When a Burlington middle-school principal was accused of kicking a student last school year, school officials were able to prove that the accusation was false by using footage from a hallway security camera.
